bookSourceComment:
// Error: 搜索正文失效

/*
	20230724 更新验证码获取逻辑，获取一次正确的验证码后，一段时间内无需再次获取-尐哖
  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)
	希望中文：https://m.5xw.net
	123读书：https://m.123du.vip
	滨州书站：https://m.binzhousz.com
	偶然中文：https://m.or7.net
	趣七屋：https://m.qu7.net
	博趣中文：https://m.1bqg.net
	洪都中文：https://m.nchdzx.com
	我来读：https://m.wolaido.com
	益生原文学：https://m.cnyxfs.com
	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokank.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

ruleBookInfo.author: class.b0@tag.span.0@text##作者：
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
class.b0@dd.-1@a@text
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(result.match(/<title>\d+</)){
cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl)
result=java.ajax(baseUrl)
}
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
cc=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl)).replace(/\%2C[^;]+/g,"")
cookie.setCookie(baseUrl,cc)
java.setContent(result)
result
</js>

ruleSearch.author: text.作者：@text##作者：
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '日阅读',
    '日收藏',
    '周阅读',
    '周收藏',
    '月阅读',
    '月收藏',
    '月投票',
    '总评分'
];
orderby = [
    'day',
    'dayBookcases',
    'week',
    'weekBookcase',
    'month',
    'monthBookcases',
    'voteNumMonthRank',
    'voteRank'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','格斗','武侠','魔幻','魔法','冒险','爱情',
    '搞笑','校园','科幻','后宫','励志','职场','美食','社会',
    '黑道','战争','历史','悬疑','竞技','体育','恐怖','推理',
    '生活','伪娘','治愈','神鬼','四格','百合','耽美','舞蹈',
    '侦探','宅男','音乐','萌系','古风','恋爱','都市','性转',
    '穿越','游戏','爱妻','日常','腹黑','古装','仙侠','生化',
    '修仙','情感','改编','纯爱','唯美','蔷薇','明星','猎奇',
    '青春','幻想','惊奇','彩虹','奇闻','权谋','宅斗','限制级',
    '装逼','浪漫','偶像','大女主','复仇','虐心','恶搞','灵异',
    '惊险','宠爱','逆袭','妖怪','暧昧','同人','架空','真人',
    '动作','橘味','宫斗','脑洞','漫改','战斗','丧尸','美少女',
    '怪物','系统','智斗','机甲','高甜','僵尸','致郁','电竞',
    '神魔','异能','末日','乙女','豪快','奇幻','绅士','正能量',
    '宫廷','亲情','养成','剧情','韩漫','轻小说','暗黑','长条',
    '玄幻','霸总','欧皇','生存','萌宠','异世界','C99','节操',
    'AA','影视化','欧风','女神','爽感','转生','成长','异形',
    '血族','团宠','反套路','双男主','无敌流','心理','颜艺','性转换',
    '舰娘','重生','其他'
];
genre = [
    '','&genre=rexue','&genre=gedou','&genre=wuxia','&genre=mohuan','&genre=mofa','&genre=maoxian','&genre=aiqing',
    '&genre=gaoxiao','&genre=xiaoyuan','&genre=kehuan','&genre=hougong','&genre=lizhi','&genre=zhichang','&genre=meishi','&genre=shehui',
    '&genre=heidao','&genre=zhanzheng','&genre=lishi','&genre=xuanyi','&genre=jingji','&genre=tiyu','&genre=kongbu','&genre=tuili',
    '&genre=shenghuo','&genre=weiniang','&genre=zhiyu','&genre=shengui','&genre=sige','&genre=baihe','&genre=danmei','&genre=wudao',
    '&genre=zhentan','&genre=zhainan','&genre=yinyue','&genre=mengxi','&genre=gufeng','&genre=lianai','&genre=dushi','&genre=xingzhuan',
    '&genre=chuanyue','&genre=youxi','&genre=aiqi','&genre=richang','&genre=fuhei','&genre=guzhuang','&genre=xianxia','&genre=shenghua',
    '&genre=xiuxian','&genre=qinggan','&genre=gaibian','&genre=chunai','&genre=weimei','&genre=qiangwei','&genre=mingxing','&genre=lieqi',
    '&genre=qingchun','&genre=huanxiang','&genre=jingqi','&genre=caihong','&genre=qiwen','&genre=quanmou','&genre=zhaidou','&genre=xianzhiji',
    '&genre=zhuangbi','&genre=langman','&genre=ouxiang','&genre=danvzhu','&genre=fuchou','&genre=nuexin','&genre=egao','&genre=lingyi',
    '&genre=jingxian','&genre=chongai','&genre=nixi','&genre=yaoguai','&genre=aimei','&genre=tongren','&genre=jiakong','&genre=zhenren',
    '&genre=dongzuo','&genre=juwei','&genre=gongdou','&genre=naodong','&genre=mangai','&genre=zhandou','&genre=sangshi','&genre=meishaonv',
    '&genre=guaiwu','&genre=xitong','&genre=zhidou','&genre=jijia','&genre=gaotian','&genre=jiangshi','&genre=zhiyu','&genre=dianjing',
    '&genre=shenmo','&genre=yineng','&genre=mori','&genre=yinv','&genre=haokuai','&genre=qihuan','&genre=shenshi','&genre=zhengnengliang',
    '&genre=gongting','&genre=qinqing','&genre=yangcheng','&genre=juqing','&genre=hanman','&genre=qingxiaoshuo','&genre=anhei','&genre=changtiao',
    '&genre=xuanhuan','&genre=bazong','&genre=ouhuang','&genre=shengcun','&genre=mengchong','&genre=yishijie','&genre=C99','&genre=jiecao',
    '&genre=AA','&genre=yingshihua','&genre=oufeng','&genre=nvshen','&genre=shuanggan','&genre=zhuansheng','&genre=chengzhang','&genre=yixing',
    '&genre=xuezu','&genre=tuanchong','&genre=fantaolu','&genre=shuangnanzhu','&genre=wudiliu','&genre=xinli','&genre=yanyi','&genre=xingzhuanhuan',
    '&genre=jianniang','&genre=zhongsheng','&genre=qita'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
Audience = `{{get('audience',Get('p'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('q'))}}`;
Header = `{{get('header','0')}}`;
Header1 = `{{get('header1','0')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/apis/c/index?pn={{page}}${genre[j]}${Area}${Audience}${Status}&order=last_date${Header}{{Get('url')}}${Header1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(31, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $1 = element => String(java.getElements(element).attr('content')); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('src')); var ScriptTruncateElements = J.select('script'); for (var j in ScriptTruncateElements) { if (String(ScriptTruncateElements[j]).includes('chapterList')) { var Script = String(ScriptTruncateElements[j]); var Json = JSON.parse(Script.replace(/.*json"\>/, '').replace(/\<\/.*/, '')); break; } } url = baseUrl; var authors = []; var authorElements = java.getElements('.mg-sub-title a'); for (var j in authorElements) { authors.push(String(authorElements[j].text())); } author = authors.join('/').replace(/[+·，\|\\]/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\.\//g, '.'); var kinds = []; var kindElements = java.getElements('.mg-cate a'); for (var j in kindElements) { kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text())); } kind = kinds.join(','); s = '★ ' + Json.score + ',' + $2('.ongoing-status').replace(/[中已]/g, ''); k = kind; t = $2('.time'); l = Json.chapterList[0].chapterName; l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🗺当前地区：〖' + (Get('o') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + z[Get('o')]) + ('\n🎯取向分类：〖' + (Get('p') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + y[Get('p')]) + ('\n⏲️漫画进度：〖' + (Get('q') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + w[Get('q')]) + ('\n📰评论页数：〖' + (Get('f') == 5 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗前' + Get('f') + '页') + ('\n📝评论排序：〖' + (Get('r') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + b[Get('r')]) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; var url1 = baseUrl.replace(/manga\//, 'v2.0/apis/comment?code='); R = ['time','hot']; var list1 = []; for (var c = 1; c <= Get('f'); c++) { var page = c; var url2 = url1 + '&pn=' + page + '&order=' + R[Get('r')] + '&from=detail'; var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var option = { "method": "GET", "headers": headers }; var Url = url2 + ',' + JSON.stringify(option); result1 = java.ajax(Url); var pageList = JSON.parse(result1).data.items; list1 = list1.concat(pageList); } var intro2 = ''; var intro3 = ''; for (var i = 0; i < list1.length; i++) { var intro2_1 = String('[' + list1[i].create_time + ']\n' + '《' + list1[i].ch_name.replace(/^\ue66e/, '').replace(/^\s+/, '') + '》').replace(/《》/, ''); var intro2_2 = '⛄' + '【' + list1[i].user.username + '】: '; var intro2_3 = list1[i].content; if (list1[i].sub_comments.length !== 0) { var list2 = list1[i].sub_comments; for (var j = list2.length-1; j >= 0; j--) { var intro2_1_1 = '[' + list2[j].create_time + ']'; var intro2_2_1 = '⛄' + '【' + list2[j].user.username + '】: '; var intro2_3_1 = (list2[j].reply_to_comment.length !== 0 ? ('@' + list2[j].reply_to_comment.user.username + '：') : '') + list2[j].content; intro3 = intro3 +'\nㅤ ' + intro2_1_1 + '\nㅤ ' + intro2_2_1 + intro2_3_1; } } intro2 = intro2 + '\nㅤ\n' + intro2_1 + '\n' + intro2_2 + intro2_3 + intro3; intro3 = ''; } book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.mg-title'), 'author': author, 'kind': String(s + ',' + k).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1'), 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ') + changeLog + '☕【评论】' + intro2, 'cover': String(Json.coverBackgroundStyle.backgroundImage).replace(/.*\(\'/, '').replace(/\'\).*/, '') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

(imglist.length - 2) : imglist.length; for(i = 0; i < L; i++){ result +='\n' } } else { '

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes("rank")) {
        var list = java.getElements('.manga-rank');
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].select('.manga-title').text(),
                'author': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[1].text()).replace(/[+·，\|\\]/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\.\//g, '.'),
                'kind': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[0].text()).replace(/\|/g, ',').replace(/\s/g, ',').replace(/、/g, ','),
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('.manga-rank-cover mip-img').attr('src') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.items;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover.replace(/\\/g, '') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': Get('url') + '/manga/' + list[i].manga_code
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pn=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pn=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/latest"},"method":"GET"}');
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.items[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';

var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var ScriptTruncateElements = java.getElements('script');
    for (var j in ScriptTruncateElements) {
        if (String(ScriptTruncateElements[j]).includes('chapterList')) {
            var Script = String(ScriptTruncateElements[j]);
            var Json = JSON.parse(Script.replace(/.*json"\>/, '').replace(/\<\/.*/, ''));
            break;
        }
    }
    var list = Json.chapterList;
    date = '〔' + java.getElements('.time').text() + '〕';
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        title = list[i].chapterName.replace(/^\ue66e/, '').replace(/^\s+/, '');
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        code = baseUrl.replace(/.*manga\//, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + date : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/reads/' + code + '/' + list[i].id
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = '"searchkey=' + e + '&v=v2.13"';
    return Get('url') + '/v2.0/apis/manga/ssearch,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/sssearch"},"method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>
